mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Recipe (RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, recipe_filename, recipe_filerename, recipe_filepath) VALUES (RECIPE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{recipeTitle}, #{memberId}, #{recipeFilename}, #{recipeFileRename}, #{recipeFilePath})
mapper.select: SELECT RECIPE.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE.MEMBER_ID, RECIPE.RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE.VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM RECIPE LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON RECIPE.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY RECIPE_NO

SELECT RECIPE.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE.MEMBER_ID, RECIPE.RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE.VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM RECIPE LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON RECIPE.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE RECIPE.RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}

SELECT DISTINCT RECIPE_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, VIEW_COUNT, R.RECIPE_NO FROM MEMBER M JOIN REFRIGERATOR FR ON FR.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN SOURCES S ON FR.SOURCES_NO = S.SOURCES_NO JOIN RECIPE_SOURCES RS ON RS.SOURCES_NO = S.SOURCES_NO JOIN RECIPE R ON R.RECIPE_NO = RS.RECIPE_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FR.SOURCES_NO = S.SOURCES_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE WHERE RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%' #{searchKeyword}

SELECT * FROM RECIPE
RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY RECIPE_NO DESC
